text: @bbusa617 @realDonaldTrump @DonaldJTrumpJr A hospital put covid19 as a cause of death on a friends dad. Prob was he died of a massive heart attack. The hospital refused to change it and a staff member admitted they recieve more funding if it is corona related. This is bullcrap! And he tested negative !!!!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
